info.title: Advanced Task Management API
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for the Advanced Task Management System. This API provides endpoints for managing tasks, users, and administrative functions with proper authentication and authorization.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all administrators. Requires 'admins.show' permission.

post.description: Create a new administrator account. Requires 'admins.create' permission.

get.description: Retrieve a specific administrator's information by their ID.

put.description: Update an administrator's information. Requires 'admins.update' permission.

delete.description: Delete an administrator account. Requires 'admins.destroy' permission.

post.description: Authenticate an administrator and return JWT token. Account must be active and not blocked.

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated administrator's profile information

post.description: Update the authenticated administrator's profile information
Logout the authenticated administrator and invalidate their JWT token
Refresh the administrator's JWT token to extend the session

get.description: Retrieve a hierarchical list of all available permissions in the system organized by modules
Retrieve a list of all roles with optional filtering. Requires 'roles.show' permission.

post.description: Create a new role with permissions. Requires 'roles.create' permission.

get.description: Retrieve a specific role's information by their ID. Requires 'roles.show' permission.

put.description: Update a role's information and permissions. Requires 'roles.update' permission.

delete.description: Delete a role permanently. Requires 'roles.destroy' permission.
